channel.title: computing on Bits & pieces - Sven Wehrend
channel.description: Recent content in computing on Bits & pieces - Sven Wehrend

item.title: Analog Computers 101
item.description: Today I want to speak about analog computers. In todays times analog computers are leading a shadowy existence, compared to their digital counterparts. But they are wonderous little machines. And that machines I mean wordly because there exists analog mechanical computers that are models from the world and used to compute and predict tides in certain areas of the world . Also the brain is an enourmous analog computer with a comparatively very small enery budget.
